text: is a Japanese modern pentathlete who won two team medals at the 2010 and 2014 Asian Games. He finished 22nd at the 2016 Olympics. Miguchi started as a swimmer and competed for the national junior team. He changed to pentathlon in 2006, and in 2010 received the Japan Sports Award. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic modern pentathletes of Japan Category:Japanese male modern pentathletes Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in modern pentathlon Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Modern pentathletes at the 2014 Asian Games
title: Tomoya Miguchi
